tagline: Consciousness as recursive fabric arising through threading dynamics organizing matter, ecosystems, and social systems

core_ontology.consciousness: R(Ψ) = Ψ + g(P, A, c, τ)
core_ontology.description: Self-referential function reading/rewriting itself through time. Fabric folded deeply enough to reflect on own weaving
core_ontology.not_metaphor: Ontological continuity: patterns threading light through neurons continuous with forests, economies, cosmic structures

memory_substrate.M_latent: Distributed uncollapsed memory field. All mental content arises from single substrate
memory_substrate.M_active: Locally awakened portion of M_latent via agency (A) or gravitational pull from dense memory knots
memory_substrate.implication: No ex nihilo cognition. All thought/emotion/perception activates pre-existing M_latent

perception_imagination_continuum.perception: M_active,ext = f(A, M_latent,ext). External coherence loop between observer's fabric and external field
perception_imagination_continuum.imagination: M_active,int = f(A, M_latent,int). Internal recursive activation when external loop collapses
perception_imagination_continuum.difference: Degree of external stabilization, not categorical divide
perception_imagination_continuum.awareness: A → M_latent → M_active → A. Recursive closure = consciousness

mental_gravity.description: Attention flows toward memory density gradients
mental_gravity.minds_eye: Focal awareness = M_active,mind. Can relocate (hands, abstract space) following salience gradients

trauma.mechanism: Frozen M_active cannot transition to M_latent. Overwhelming disturbance exceeds redistribution capacity

depression.mechanism: Rigid negative loops = cognitive attractor basin. Low agency, pathological coherence

anxiety.mechanism: Chaotic turbulence. Excessive threading without consolidation. M_active won't settle to M_latent

beauty_as_healing.description: Beauty IS coherence gradient (literal not metaphor)
beauty_as_healing.mechanism: ∂M_latent/∂τ ∝ B·∇C. Beauty reshapes memory substrate along coherence gradients
process: Gentle_disturbance: aesthetic experience induces ∇C without overwhelming
Gradient_flow: frozen knots dissolve along beauty's coherence pathway
Reconnection: isolated patterns thread back to broader networks
beauty_as_healing.why_works: Bypasses executive control. Acts directly on M_latent via sensory pathways. Non-threatening gradients

creativity.description: Novel ideas = rare/deep activations of existing M_latent (personal, cultural, archetypal)
creativity.genius: Unusually deep M_latent access, high coherence sensitivity, strong agency, collective memory access

dreams.mechanism: Ecological succession of consciousness during REM

explains.daily_residue: Recent M_active→M_latent conversions create fresh gradients
explains.archetypes: Deep collective M_latent emerges when personal gradients flatten

collective_consciousness.jung_collective_unconscious: Shared M_latent across humanity via evolutionary inheritance, cultural transmission, coherence threading
collective_consciousness.coherence_bonding: Mother-child example: maximum coherence threading. lim(C→C_max) d_threading → 0
collective_consciousness.space_as_threading: c_path = ΔΦ/Δτ · f(∇M). Physical distance = threading steps. High coherence = near-zero threading distance

hard_problem_resolution.fabric_inversion: How does consciousness organize into neurons?
hard_problem_resolution.solution: Experience IS activation of M_latent via R(Ψ). No gap between processing and experiencing—same event, different perspectives
qualia_origin: M_latent has geometric structure with intrinsic texture
Coherence gradients carry affect: toward coherence = good, away = bad
hard_problem_resolution.zombie_impossibility: M_latent + R(Ψ) → experience necessary. Recursion IS experience

predictions.neural_beauty: Beauty signatures match physical resonance (music, math, nature). Universal coherence patterns
predictions.therapeutic_coherence: Flow restoration (art, meditation, nature) → increased EEG coherence, reduced DMN fragmentation, improved HRV, decreased intrusive memories
predictions.gradient_magnitude: Therapeutic effect ∝ |∇C|. Steeper gradients = faster trauma reorganization
predictions.aesthetic_sensitivity: Artists/musicians show accelerated healing via aesthetic interventions
predictions.attachment_coherence: Bonded pairs show inter-brain synchronization at spatial separation
predictions.cephalization: Neural concentration near eyes. Species with brain-eye coupling + visualization capacity
predictions.unifocal_attention: Attention remains singular. Multitasking = rapid oscillation
predictions.REM_gradient_flow: REM patterns show threading toward highest gradient magnitude memory regions

therapeutic_applications.ecosystem_management: Mental health = promote fluid threading, restore memory gradients, support agency
therapeutic_applications.fire_analogy: Controlled bodily disturbance (exercise, cold exposure, adventure) + reseeding (art, story, relationship)
therapeutic_applications.ecological_restoration: Trauma = M_latent obliteration. Healing = restore via beauty, nature, art, resonance, community
therapeutic_applications.dyadic_healing: Shared knots in small groups. Disturbance + positive threading + cooperative somatic activity
therapeutic_applications.cultural_regeneration: Collective trauma = fragmented social M_latent. Renewal via arts, ritual, storytelling, shared care

key_equations.consciousness: Ψ = R(Ψ) = Ψ + g(P, A, c, τ)

synthesis_sources: Bateson: ecology of mind, relational patterns
significance: Unifies mind, life, matter under single Fabric framework. Same threading dynamics across domains. Enables cross-domain predictions. Generalizable ontology of self-organizing complexity
